stateDiagram

state MENU {

        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
        state "." as MENU.(InitialState)

        MENU__DISARM_SYSTEM

        MENU__DISARM_SYSTEM : MENU__DISARM_SYSTEM

        MENU__DISARM_SYSTEM : enter / #123; lcd->MENU__DISARM_SYSTEM()#59; #125;

        MENU__ARM_SYSTEM

        MENU__ARM_SYSTEM : MENU__ARM_SYSTEM

        MENU__ARM_SYSTEM : enter / #123; lcd->MENU__ARM_SYSTEM()#59; #125;

        MENU__CONFIG

        MENU__CONFIG : MENU__CONFIG

        MENU__CONFIG : enter / #123; lcd->MENU__CONFIG()#59; #125;

        MENU__DATA

        MENU__DATA : MENU__DATA

        MENU__DATA : enter / #123; lcd->MENU__DATA()#59; #125;

        DISARM_SYSTEM

        DISARM_SYSTEM : DISARM_SYSTEM

        DISARM_SYSTEM : enter / #123; lcd->DISARM_SYSTEM()#59; #125;

        ARM_SYSTEM

        ARM_SYSTEM : ARM_SYSTEM

        ARM_SYSTEM : enter / #123; lcd->ARM_SYSTEM()#59; #125;

        state CONFIG {

                %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
                %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
                state "." as CONFIG.(InitialState)

                CONFIG__CHANGE_CODE

                CONFIG__CHANGE_CODE : CONFIG__CHANGE_CODE

                CONFIG__CHANGE_CODE : enter / #123; lcd->CONFIG__CHANGE_CODE()#59; #125;

                CONFIG__ARMING_DELAY

                CONFIG__ARMING_DELAY : CONFIG__ARMING_DELAY

                CONFIG__ARMING_DELAY : enter / #123; lcd->CONFIG__ARMING_DELAY()#59; #125;

                CONFIG__ALARM_DELAY

                CONFIG__ALARM_DELAY : CONFIG__ALARM_DELAY

                CONFIG__ALARM_DELAY : enter / #123; lcd->CONFIG__ALARM_DELAY()#59; #125;

                CHANGE_CODE

                CHANGE_CODE : CHANGE_CODE

                CHANGE_CODE : enter / #123; lcd->CHANGE_CODE()#59; #125;

                ARMING_DELAY

                ARMING_DELAY : ARMING_DELAY

                ARMING_DELAY : enter / #123; lcd->ARMING_DELAY()#59; #125;

                ALARM_DELAY

                ALARM_DELAY : ALARM_DELAY

                ALARM_DELAY : enter / #123; lcd->ALARM_DELAY()#59; #125;

                SECRET_MENU

                SECRET_MENU : SECRET_MENU

                SECRET_MENU : enter / #123; lcd->SECRET_MENU()#59; #125;

                SECRET_MENU : enter / #123; audio->play_secret()#59; #125;

                SECRET_MENU : LCD_UPDATE / #123; lcd->SECRET_MENU_update()#59; #125;

                SECRET_MENU : LCD_UPDATE / #123; timeout_ms = IDLE_TIMEOUT_MS#59; /* disable timeout */ #125;

                SECRET_MENU : ANY_PRESS / #123; lcd->SECRET_MENU_button(event_id)#59; #125;

        }

        state DATA {

                %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
                %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
                state "." as DATA.(InitialState)

                UPTIME

                UPTIME : UPTIME

                UPTIME : enter / #123; lcd->UPTIME()#59; #125;

                UPTIME : LCD_UPDATE / #123; lcd->UPTIME_update()#59; #125;

                SENSOR

                SENSOR : SENSOR

                SENSOR : enter / #123; lcd->SENSOR()#59; #125;

                SENSOR : LCD_UPDATE / #123; lcd->SENSOR_update()#59; #125;

        }

}

SPLASH_SCREEN

SPLASH_SCREEN : SPLASH_SCREEN

SPLASH_SCREEN : enter / #123; lcd->SPLASH_SCREEN()#59; #125;

SPLASH_SCREEN : enter / #123; timeout_ms = 3*1000#59; #125;

HOME

HOME : HOME

HOME : (enter, REFRESH) / #123; lcd->HOME()#59; #125;

HOME : LCD_UPDATE / #123; lcd->HOME_update()#59; #125;

PANIC

PANIC : PANIC

PANIC : enter / #123; lcd->PANIC()#59; #125;

PANIC : enter / #123; ctrl->panic()#59; #125;

PANIC : enter / #123; timeout_ms = 3*1000#59; #125;

%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
%% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

UiSm --> PANIC : PANIC_BUTTON

MENU --> HOME : (BACK_PRESS, BACK_HELD, TIMEOUT)

MENU.(InitialState) --> MENU__DISARM_SYSTEM

MENU__DISARM_SYSTEM --> MENU__ARM_SYSTEM : DOWN_PRESS

MENU__DISARM_SYSTEM --> DISARM_SYSTEM : ENTER_PRESS

MENU__ARM_SYSTEM --> MENU__CONFIG : DOWN_PRESS

MENU__ARM_SYSTEM --> MENU__DISARM_SYSTEM : UP_PRESS

MENU__ARM_SYSTEM --> ARM_SYSTEM : ENTER_PRESS

MENU__CONFIG --> MENU__DATA : DOWN_PRESS

MENU__CONFIG --> MENU__ARM_SYSTEM : UP_PRESS

MENU__CONFIG --> CONFIG : ENTER_PRESS

MENU__DATA --> MENU__CONFIG : UP_PRESS

MENU__DATA --> DATA : ENTER_PRESS

DISARM_SYSTEM --> MENU__DISARM_SYSTEM : BACK_PRESS

DISARM_SYSTEM --> HOME : ENTER_PRESS / #123; ctrl->disarm()#59; #125;

ARM_SYSTEM --> MENU__ARM_SYSTEM : BACK_PRESS

ARM_SYSTEM --> HOME : ENTER_PRESS / #123; ctrl->arm()#59; #125;

CONFIG --> MENU__CONFIG : BACK_PRESS

CONFIG.(InitialState) --> CONFIG__CHANGE_CODE

CONFIG__CHANGE_CODE --> CONFIG__ARMING_DELAY : DOWN_PRESS

CONFIG__CHANGE_CODE --> CHANGE_CODE : ENTER_PRESS

CONFIG__ARMING_DELAY --> CONFIG__ALARM_DELAY : DOWN_PRESS

CONFIG__ARMING_DELAY --> CONFIG__CHANGE_CODE : UP_PRESS

CONFIG__ARMING_DELAY --> ARMING_DELAY : ENTER_PRESS

CONFIG__ALARM_DELAY --> CONFIG__ARMING_DELAY : UP_PRESS

CONFIG__ALARM_DELAY --> ALARM_DELAY : ENTER_PRESS

CHANGE_CODE --> CONFIG__CHANGE_CODE : BACK_PRESS

CHANGE_CODE --> SECRET_MENU : UP_DOWN_HELD

ARMING_DELAY --> CONFIG__ARMING_DELAY : BACK_PRESS

ALARM_DELAY --> CONFIG__ALARM_DELAY : BACK_PRESS

DATA --> MENU__DATA : BACK_PRESS

DATA.(InitialState) --> UPTIME

UPTIME --> SENSOR : DOWN_PRESS

SENSOR --> UPTIME : UP_PRESS

SPLASH_SCREEN --> HOME : TIMEOUT

HOME --> MENU : ENTER_PRESS

PANIC --> HOME : TIMEOUT

ROOT.(InitialState) --> SPLASH_SCREEN
Events
settings
